message.body: Lizaness.....any interest in retrieving me from the airport, please pretty please...? I have a widevariety of chocolate (that i'm going to give to you an

yway, lol)...
My flight lands at nine forty tonight.
Leesie I'm sooo sorry I never texted you again! I've been feeling sick all day and I've been doing hw and somehow I managed to forget to text you again :( are you back yet?
No worries! I am back. Will see you soon. Although my stomach is misbehaving, but not terribly. Is it your stomach too?
Mer. Feel nasty am going to stay at apt. See you tomorrow...
Ugh ugh I am shit at text responses today. I'm sorry you feel shitty! It seems to be a trend :-/ feel better, see you tomorrow!
Hey! Are you coming back soon?
